document.masterDocTitle: Phytoseiidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from natural ecosystems in the State of São Paulo, Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Phytoseiidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from natural ecosystems in the State of São Paulo, Brazil

mods:name.mods:namePart: Castro, Tatiane Marie Martins Gomes De

subSubSection.paragraph:
Typhlodromalus peregrinus
.—Muma et al . 1970 : 88 ; Moraes et al . 1986 : 132 ; 2004 b: 202 ; Zacarias & Moraes 2001 : 582 ; Chant & McMurtry 2005 b: 199 ; 2007 : 111 ; Guanilo et al. , 2008 a: 15 ; 2008 b: 25 ; Denmark & Evans, 2011 : 57 ; Ferragut et al. , 2011 : 42 .

Typhlodromus ( Amblyseius ) robineae Chant, 1959 : 98
(synonymy according to Muma, 1964 ).

Typhlodromus ( Amblyseius ) evansi Chant, 1959 : 99
(synonymy according to Muma, 1964 ).

Typhlodromus ( Amblyseius ) primulae Chant, 1959 : 99
(synonymy according to Muma, 1964 ).
